intro.title: Pulp Fiction Chronicles
intro.subtitle: Test your knowledge of Quentin Tarantino's non-linear crime epic.

outro.title: Pulp Fiction Chronicles
outro.subtitle: Test your knowledge of Quentin Tarantino's non-linear crime epic.

facts.title: The Briefcase Mystery
facts.description: The contents of the glowing briefcase in Pulp Fiction are never explicitly revealed, leaving its mystery open to countless fan theories.

facts.title: Uma Thurman's Role
facts.description: Quentin Tarantino wrote the character of Mia Wallace specifically for Uma Thurman, though she initially hesitated to take the role.

facts.title: Dance Royale
facts.description: The famous dance scene between Mia and Vincent was partly inspired by Federico Fellini's 8Â½.
